name: Motion Controller
description: Controls lights based on motion detection with optional darkness and nightmode settings

timer.label: Timer
timer.description: Time to keep lights on after motion

help.description: Intelligent motion-activated lighting controller with support for darkness detection, nightmode, timer-based auto-off, and manual override.

motion.name: motion
motion.description: Boolean indicating motion detection (true = motion detected)

darkness.name: darkness
darkness.description: Boolean indicating darkness (true = dark, required when 'Only in darkness' is enabled)

night.name: night
night.description: Boolean indicating nightmode state (true = nightmode active)

manualControl.name: manualControl
manualControl.description: Boolean to override automatic control (true = disable automation)

command.name: command
command.description: Direct command to control lights ('On', 'Off', or 'Night')

payload.name: payload
payload.description: Light control command based on motion, darkness, and mode settings

details.text: Configure matchers to identify motion, darkness, nightmode, and manual control inputs from different message sources.
When motion is detected (and darkness condition is met if enabled), lights turn on and stay on for the configured timer duration.
Enable 'Only in darkness' to activate lights only when it's dark, preventing unnecessary activation during daytime.
Enable 'Nightmode enabled' to use dimmed nightmode lighting during nighttime hours instead of full brightness.
Manual control input can disable automation temporarily, allowing manual light control without interference.
The timer resets with each new motion detection, keeping lights on as long as movement continues.
